name: Star Wars II
overview: Star Wars II is a 1-player arcade game for the VIC-20. The player tries to destroy as many alien ships as possible in 2 minutes. Ships appear 1 at a time, and the goal is to use the direction keys to position the enemy within a cross-hair at the center of the screen. Once positioned, they can be destroyed with laser fire. The ship starts with 300 energy, and each shot uses 10 energy. When a ship is destroyed, another takes its place. The game is over when energy is exhausted or 2 minutes have expired.
